Articles.Content:
Hi, I have a couple questions about mods. First off, how do I get them into my game? I have watched a few tutorials on how to get them but I couldn't manage to get them correctly. If you have a link to a good tutorial or good instructions please let me know. Also, my other question is what good mods re there for me to download? 

 

Thanks!

Just a very small selection of mods right here on the forum:

Check this to find how to mod KSP.

Edited December 30, 2016 by Tex_NL

as a non pc gamer i was scared about venturing into mods,  then i found how easy it is for KSP.

 

Head into your file directories, your steam folder and then into the KSP folder.   Within this you want to find a folder called "GameData"  it should just have a "squad" folder in it for unmodded.

Then download your mods, then drag them there, or copy and paste.
Modding question moved to the modding subforum.
